ygData.subject: Re: Tactics Soloing with Screaming Terror
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/8/99 10:58:35 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... no ... up ... before ... DUH!  Sorry about that :)  Some days it does not pay to crawl from
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/8/99 10:58:35 PM Eastern Standard Time,
ntshadow@... writes:

> I think you miss understood the email when he said he would have time to
> cast 2-4 Darkness spells. Basically the mob would be ST'ed and stand there
> til it was damaged. Well you cast Darkness on it, if is sticks mob free
> start kiting. If it is resisted no damage done to mob, mob still under ST.
> Cast Darkness again, if sticks start kiting (since it slowed) if resisted
no
> damage to mob, mob still under ST. Basically what he was saying was that
> with Screaming Terror you can kite a lot easier since you can usually get
up
> to 4 casts of darkness (since the resist rate is so bad on that line)
before
> the mob will start coming for you.
>

DUH! Sorry about that :) Some days it does not pay to crawl from the
grave...
